alert.note: Alert for Adams (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 23 at 9:32AM EDT until July 23 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 AM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ADAMS...NORTHEASTERN JAY AND SOUTHWESTERN VAN WERT COUNTIES... At 931 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles west of Rockford to near Geneva, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Westchester, Willshire, Abanaka, Trinity, New Corydon, Schumm and Bellfountain. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
